job.title: Customer Success Manager, Emerging

job.description: procore is looking for ltstronggtcustomer success managers ltstronggt to join our expanding emerging team in this role youll create procore experts and evangelists throughout our managerltstronggt youre solely responsible for postsales implementation success and long term adoption of a shared book of business youll work with emergingsmb clients to plan rollout strategies execute the implementation and onboarding of new accounts while maintaining and growing existing customer relationships youll develop multiple new accounts at a time manage client training and create business processes the role requires a deep understanding of procores vertical and is a balance of independent work within a highly collaborative teamltbrgtltbrgtthis position will report to the manager of customer success and is based in our carpinteria ca office ltstronggtltstronggt were looking for candidates to join us immediatelyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll
